columns.title: Schedule
columns.description:
Date: 20 August 2016
Ceremony: 2.30pm - 3.30pm
Photos and drinks: 3.30pm - 4.30pm
Reception: 4.30pm until late
Dinner: 5.30pm


Dress code

Formal / summer formal

Dress to impress - and for the weather, since we'll be in a marquee and garden setting. We advise bringing a light jacket for the evening, and wearing shoes suitable for walking in the garden (i.e. maybe not stilettos!).


Gifts

Since we've already kitted out our flat, we’re avoiding a traditional gift list. However, if you’d really like to give us something, we would be very grateful of any contributions towards making our honeymoon special.

columns.title: Getting there
columns.description:
The ceremony and reception will be held in Peggy's parents' garden at:

The Spinney
84 Hamerton Road
Alconbury Weston
Huntindon
PE8 4JD

Car

Most sat navs will only take you half-way down Hamerton Road, but you need to continue all the way to the end. Our house is just before the national speed limit sign, and has an up-wards sloping drive. Parking will be sign-posted. Just a friendly reminder, please don’t drink and drive!

Train

The nearest train station is Huntingdon, but Peterborough is also relatively close. From the train station you can get a taxi (see below); alternatively, both train stations are within walking distance of a bus station, although the bus service to Alconbury Weston is limited (see below).

Bus

The bus service from local towns to Alconbury Weston is limited and does not run late. You can find timetables by searching ‘Alconbury Weston’ here.

Taxi

Try Steve’s Taxis on 01480 412333 or John’s Taxis on 01480 450092.

columns.title: Accommodation
columns.description:
If you’re planning to stay overnight in the area, below are some suggested venues. All are within a 5-15 minute taxi ride away from the wedding.

Country pub accomodation:

  • Manor House, Alconbury
  • The Stukeleys Country Hotel, Little Stukeley
  • The Old Bridge, Huntingdon (a more luxurious version of the country pub!)

Hotels (in order of cost):

  • Redwings Lodge, Sawtry
  • Premiere Inn, Huntingdon
  • Marriott, Huntingdon
